```{r  setup, message=F, warning=F}
library(dplyr)
library(nif)

nif_option(silent = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
csv_file <- tempfile(fileext = ".csv")
on.exit(unlink(csv_file))

csv_content <- examplinib_sad_min_nif |>
write_nonmem(sep = ",")

writeLines(csv_content, csv_file)
```

```{r}
nif <- import_nif(
  csv_file,
  # DOSE ~ AMT,
  # ANALYTE ~ "TEST",
  # PARENT ~ "TEST",
  # TAFD ~ TIME,
  format = "csv", silent = F)

plot(nif)
make_plot_data_set(nif)
```
